name: Fidget Spinner Games
description:
*RANKED IN TOP 50 GAMES AROUND THE WORLD*
The most relaxing fidget spinner simulator toy in your pocket!
-----
Bored in a meeting or is class too long? Then download this fun fidget spinner toy to relax, relief your stress, and just kill some time!

It's like a real fidget spinner, but even better with multiple game modes!

Use your finger to swipe the fidget spinner left or right, and sweep the sweet reward coins! Upgrade your finger hand spinner, compete with your friends, and beat the records!

Each spin brings you closer to unlocking a new fidget spinner finger toy.

Can you unlock them all?!
